titles.title: RS639 This we can do for justice and for peace

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
This we can do for justice and for peace:
we can pray,
and work to answer prayers that other people say.
This we can do in faith,
and see it through -
for Jesus is alive today.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
This we can do for justice and for peace:
we can give
till ev'ryone can take life in their hands, and live.
This we can do in love
and see it through -
for Jesus is alive today.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
This we can do for justice and for peace:
we can see
and help our neighbours see - what is, and what could be.
This we can do in truth
and see it through -
for Jesus is alive today.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
This we can do for justice and for peace:
bring to light
whatever hurts and tramples down, or hides from sight.
This we can do with strength
and see it through -
for Jesus is alive today.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
This we can do for justice and for peace:
we can hope
and, hoping, stride along our way while others grope.
This we can do till God
makes all things new
for Jesus is alive today.
